sub_title: Senior Sourcing manager ICT bij Vanderlande
summary:
•	Logistic procurement and implementation specialist experienced in distribution and warehousing 
•	Proven successful in implementations of warehouses and distribution services
•	Experienced project manager and capable of working under time pressure and changing priority settings 
•	No nonsense attitude combined with a solid logistic background together with strong analytical skills. 
•	Experienced strategic purchaser
•	Able to communicate on different levels in the organisation
•	Experienced in analysing and optimising processes and distribution flows. 
•	Working with drive and enthusiasm 
•	Result driven and a team player.

location.default: Son en Breugel, North Brabant, Netherlands

education.field_of_study: Logistics, Materials, and Supply Chain Management

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for managing assigned supplier relationships, services and products focused on Quality, Logistics, Cost and Innovation for commodities like Travel, Forwarding& Distribution, HR, IT and Consultancy as well as Facilities
•	Participation in project teams in an early stage to ensure that supply chain decisions are in line with the sourcing strategy and assures timely sourcing contribution to milestone gates (including plans to achieve project target costs).
•	Partner with key business stakeholders to initiate, plan and manage sourcing activities across multiple spend categories from inception through contract execution
•	Translate business requirements into sourcing strategy development, contract negotiation and vendor selection
•	Manages escalations regarding delivery, quality and overall performance issues
•	Runs risk management programs with assigned suppliers
•	Build strong working relationships with key business stakeholders in order to further extend the influence and value proposition of the Procurement organization
•	Drive best practices across groups and regions for assigned sourcing activities
profile_positions.title: Sourcing account manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Overall accountability of 3PL relationship, spend, compliance and performance in European region
•	Site responsible including managing the departments Planning, HRM, Transport, Data management and Customer service (30 FTE)
•	Develop, manage and implement improvement projects (logistics) 
•	Procurement of warehouse activities
•	Responsible for outsourcing of the warehouse to another service provider to increase the service level for all our customers in Europe
•	Responsible for site budget
•	Day to day management of operations on-site, manage daily outsourced warehouse operations and processes
profile_positions.title: Site Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Develop, manage and implement improvement projects (logistics) for DAF Trucks and PACCAR Parts
•	Optimization transport network.
•	Set-up and run warehouse and distribution tenders in Europe
•	Analytics and cost breakdown of transportation cost
profile_positions.title: Commodity Manager Logistics

profile_positions.description:
•	Procurement of warehouse activities
•	Develop central strategic purchasing within Malmberg.
•	Negotiate as lead buyer on behalf of total Malmberg.
•	Set-up Contract management tool and procurement to pay with 2 way matching.
•	Define sourcing strategy, participate in the early phase of the New Product Introduction cycle. 
•	Manage and improve existing global supplier relations, focused on Quality, cost and innovation support.
•	Agree and align with all Malmberg stakeholders on the sourcing strategy and deployment.
•	Responsible and accountable for procurement targets such as negotiation results, cost savings, contract coverage, leveraged spend, liquidity drivers and benchmarking.
•	Ensure contract coverage for majority of the suppliers.
profile_positions.title: Strategic purchaser

profile_positions.description:
•	Agree and sign off and implement, with 3PL on processes & systems to have a full operating warehouse in place against agreed performance level in 3 different countries and sign off the SLA with the 3PL.
•	Develop and agree on warehouse requirements and processes (formal sign off where applicable) with stakeholders in and outside the organization. Determine and align on the end state including the approach to reach the end state. Respecting the (local) culture, rules and regulations.
•	Agree new process description and quality level aiming to maintain or improve the service to the customers.
•	Create tender documents.
•	Functional responsible for the timely delivery of the program milestones in close cooperation with the project managers. This relates to:
o	Business Requirements (customer, business, legal, )
o	Process requirement and standardization
o	(IT-) system requirements
o	Knowledge transfer
profile_positions.title: Process Manager Warehousing & Distribution

profile_positions.description:
•	Develop, manage and implement (logistics) improvement projects for Philips lighting sites.
•	Set-up and improve KPI measurement throughout the whole supply chain.
•	Set-up and execute warehouse and distribution tenders in Europe for Philips lighting sides.
•	Improve in and outbound department according to Lean approach.
•	Optimization transport network.
•	Optimization of warehouse processes
profile_positions.title: European Distribution engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Set-up and run distribution tenders in Europe for the local Philips sides. 
•	Negotiation of Price and Service Level Agreements.
•	On site logistics support in the Benelux, first point of contact for internal customers concerning questions about sea, road an air transportation including alignment between strategy and the needs of the sites
•	Member of the airfreight Commodity Strategy Team and co-developed airfreight strategy for Philips worldwide.
•	Develop, manage and implement (logistics) improvement projects for several Philips sites.
•	Responsible for maintaining, negotiating of domestic contracts for the Benelux region and manage the  service providers
•	Spend Analyses for all Philips sites in the Benelux.
•	Develop and maintain performance reporting framework. 
•	Organised several logistics councils (20 till 80 people) throughout Europe.
profile_positions.title: Forwarding & Distribution manager Benelux
